#summary The navigator.appMinorVersion property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property,from-microsoft

== Values ==

The `navigator.appMinorVersion` property returns a string.

[BrowserFamilyMSIE Internet Explorer] always seems returns `"0"` for this property, even [BrowserMSIE55 Internet Explorer 5.5].

But [BrowserMSIE6 Internet Explorer 6] shows the service pack. 
Example navigator.appMinorVersion = 'SP[X]' where [X] is the service pack number

This property is read-only.
